33.ara-name: كتاب الفتن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Aishah narrated "The Messenger of Allah(s.a.w) said:'In the end of this Ummah there will be a collapse, transformation, and Qadhf."' She said :"I said: 'O Messenger of Allah! Will they be destroyed while they are righteous among them?' He said: 'Yes, when evil is dominant

chapter.eng-name: What has been Related About The Earth Swallowing
